thread.title: Ronaldo given unbelievable 99 rating as FIFA release special Team of the Year players
thread.title_full: Ronaldo given unbelievable 99 rating as FIFA release special Team of the Year players

title: Ronaldo given unbelievable 99 rating as FIFA release special Team of the Year players
text:
0 10-Jan-2017 00:27:44 Cristiano Ronaldo, Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez are all available to pack on Ultimate Team, after they were all included in the FIFA FIFPro Team of the Year in the real world 
FIFA Ultimate Team players have been given a rather special Team of the Year treat! 
The FIFA FIFPro Team of the Year was revealed on Monday, with Real Madrid superstar Cristiano Ronaldo and Barcelona duo Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez making up a fearsome looking triumvirate. 
And now EA Sports have marked the occasion with some truly incredible Ultimate Team cards, that are available in packs. 
Ronaldo has been given a rating of 99, with 98 pace, 98 dribbling, 99 shooting, 92 passing and 94 physical. If you come up against him, you’re probably going to lose. 
— EA SPORTS FIFA (@EASPORTSFIFA) January 9, 2017 
A 98-rated Messi, too, looks like a sensational potential pack pull, boasting 97 pace, 99 dribbling, 99 shooting, 97 passing and 80 physical. 
And Suarez, also rated at 98, makes up the trio, with 93 pace, 97 dribbling, 99 shooting, 92 passing and 93 physical. 
If you pack all three, you may well be unbeatable. Related
